page.title: 21Stenhousemuir 2011
page.content:
Now we have an Asda at the heart of Stenhousemuuir. Part of the original preceinct remains but the library has 'moved'. To be fair the new centre is an improvement. The Cannons have been replaced by highland cow statues in homage to McCowans Toffee (incidently the plnt just shut).

Elsewhere the area is still growing. A lot of what was Bellsdyke Mental Hospital is now a housing estate. Commuter numbers using Larbert station has grown. The FalkirkTryst Golf Club and Stenhousemuir Cricket Club keep a bit of green in the town.
Contribution by: John Owens
